price: Hakika hao walikuwa kabla ya haya wakiishi maisha ya anasa.
footnotes: Hakika hao kabla ya haya walikuwa wamepita kiasi katika kustarehea neema za duniani, wamepumbaa hawataki kumt'ii Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
